Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஒழுக்கமும் வாய்மையும் நாணும்இம் மூன்றும் இழுக்கார் குடிப்பிறந் தார்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The high-born will never deviate from these three; good manners, truthfulness and modesty.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person of noble birth ('குடிப்பிறந்தார்') is shown walking a high, narrow, but straight path, representing a life of high standards.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The path is defined by three shining rails that they hold onto, never letting go ('இழுக்கார்'). The first rail is made of crystal, for Good Conduct ('ஒழுக்கம்'). The second is a rail of pure gold, for Truthfulness ('வாய்மை'). The third is a rail of silver, for Modesty ('நாணம்').
Layered_Composition.Background: The path is high above a chaotic, tempting world below. The noble person's adherence to the three rails keeps them safe and on the high path.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The noble-born will never swerve from the three virtues of good conduct, truthfulness, and modesty.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The high path with its three shining rails is the central metaphor. The person's firm grip on these rails represents their unwavering adherence to these virtues.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bright, clear light illuminates the high path. The three rails shine with their respective materials' pure light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that emphasizes the height and straightness of the path, and the person's firm resolve.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: High-fantasy art, with a strong allegorical message.

Cultural_Anchors: The Noble will not swerve ('இழுக்கார் குடிப்பிறந்தார்')

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: person falling off the path, broken rails, text artifacts, cartoonish.
